trans-unit.source: Get a remote desktop protocol file from a node
trans-unit.target: Get a remote desktop protocol file from a node

trans-unit.source: Gets the Remote Desktop Protocol file for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: Gets the Remote Desktop Protocol file for the specified node.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to nodes.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to nodes.

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that contains the node.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that contains the node.

trans-unit.source: Replace {node-id} with the id of the node from which you want to get the Remote Desktop Protocol file.
trans-unit.target: Replace {node-id} with the id of the node from which you want to get the Remote Desktop Protocol file.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The response contains the contents of the RDP file.
trans-unit.target: The response contains the contents of the RDP file.

trans-unit.source: Before you can access a node by using the RDP file, you must create a user account on the node.
trans-unit.target: Before you can access a node by using the RDP file, you must create a user account on the node.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="5c7e9862-cb0e-439d-8907-817bf889e9be" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add a user account to a node</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="5c7e9862-cb0e-439d-8907-817bf889e9be" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Add a user account to a node</link>.
